snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg prods President Obama on gun control; police say the suspect’s brother was not involved; only one American mass killing, the Virginia Tech massacre, took a higher toll.
abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg prods President Obama on gun control; police say the suspect’s brother was not involved; only one American mass killing, the Virginia Tech massacre, took a higher toll.

headline.main: Dec. 14 Updates on Connecticut School Shooting
